title: Byteman 4.0.22 has been released
content: Byteman 4.0.22 is now available from the and from the . It is the latest update release for use on all JDK9+ runtimes up to and including JDK22.    Byteman 4.0.22 is a maintenance release which enables Byteman to be used with JDK22 releases. It also contains  few small bug fixes and a feature enhancement. More details are provided in the and the latest .
